heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_legion_commander
heroes.bio_loc:
They came without warning. Within the city walls of Stonehall there came a rumble and a terrible sound, and from blackness unknown came a force of beasts numbering beyond count, wielding flame and foul sorcery, slaying and snatching mothers and sons to dark purpose. Of once-mighty Stonehall's military strength only the Bronze Legion, led by the indomitable Commander Tresdin, was near enough to answer the call of battle. They rode into their city, fighting through bloodstained alleyways and burning markets, cutting their way through the monstrous throng to the source of the sudden invasion: an ethereal rift within the city square, and at its precipice thundered their dreaded champion.

Enwrapped in a corrosive shimmer, the leader of the abyssal horde swung its massive blade, cleaving a legionnaire in two as his flesh began to spoil. Tresdin lifted her blood-stained sword and settled her sights on the beast. It turned, smiling at her through a maze of teeth. Heedless of the battle raging around them, they charged one another.

Deflecting blow after blow, the pair danced their deadly duel as the Bronze Legion met its end around them. Tresdin leapt forward as her foe swung its sword to meet her. The odds turned. The attack smashed into Tresdin suddenly, a brutal thrust from the side, but even as her balance slipped she rallied her strength for another stroke. Blade scraped on blade, beyond the hilt to the gnarled paw below, carving it in two in a fearsome spray of sparks and blood. The vile audience looked on in astonishment as she pressed the attack, driving her blade through her foe's flesh into the stampeding heart within. With a scream that split the clouds above, the beast erupted in a torrent of gore and anguish. The stygian portal wavered, the power sustaining the chasm beyond vanishing as suddenly as it had appeared. The remaining invaders fell quickly to Stonehall steel.

Though victorious, the survivors saw little to celebrate: the city lay in ruins, and survivors were few. Fires continued to spread. Unfurling her banners of war, Tresdin gathered what allies she could. Her anger smoldered as she pledged brutal vengeance upon the forces of the abyss, and damned be any who would dare stand in her way.
heroes.hype_loc: Marching across the battlefield, Legion Commander challenges lone enemies in single combat. Each duel she wins increases the power of her attacks, until at last she can become a relentless one-woman army.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Increases power with each duel victory

abilities.name: legion_commander_overwhelming_odds
abilities.desc_loc: Turns the enemies' numbers against them, dealing damage per unit or per hero and granting you bonus attack speed. Deals bonus damage to illusions and summoned units as a percent of their current health. Can be cast during Duel.
abilities.lore_loc: The archers of Stonehall are ready at Tresdin's command.
abilities.shard_loc: Gives %duel_radius_bonus% bonus radius when cast during Duel.
facets_loc: Overwhelming Odds grants an all damage barrier based on the damage it deals to enemy heroes.

abilities.name: legion_commander_press_the_attack
abilities.desc_loc:
Removes debuffs and disables from the target friendly unit, and grants bonus movement speed and health regen for a short time.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
abilities.lore_loc: The rallying horn of the Bronze Legion is able to inspire any heart.
abilities.shard_loc: Press The Attack targets now gain Debuff Immunity for 1.75 seconds. Reduces cooldown by 2 seconds.

abilities.name: legion_commander_moment_of_courage
abilities.desc_loc: When attacked, Legion Commander has a chance to immediately counterattack with bonus lifesteal.
abilities.lore_loc: Tresdin knows that an enemy's most vulnerable moment often follows their fiercest stroke.

abilities.name: legion_commander_duel
abilities.desc_loc: Legion Commander and the target enemy hero are forced to attack each other for a short duration.  Neither hero can use items or abilities, with the exception of Legion Commander being able to cast Overwhelming Odds. If either hero dies during the duration, the hero winning the Duel gains permanent bonus damage.
abilities.lore_loc: To face a soldier of Stonehall in single combat is a challenge few can resist.
notes_loc: Duels will end if the units are pushed 2000 units apart.
Winning a Duel automatically casts Press the Attack on yourself.
abilities.shard_loc: Increases Duel damage by %shard_duel_damage_bonus% per win. Applies retroactively.
abilities.scepter_loc: Increases Duel duration and reduces cooldown.  Legion Commander is debuff immune for the duration of the Duel.
facets_loc: When a Duel is won, units that damaged the loser during the Duel will receive a small amount of permanent damage.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_legion_commander_8
talents.name_loc: Press the Attack grants {s:value}s Debuff Immunity
